channel.title: Ankle – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Lace Ankle Support Brace: Stable & Adjustable Lace Up Ankle Foot Stabilizer Sprained Ankle
item.dc:creator: EcomClips
item.description:
The AT 388 LACE ANKLE SUPPORT has been designed and manufactured by AT Surgical specifically to treat and provide rapid relief to weak ankles and…

The post Lace Ankle Support Brace: Stable & Adjustable Lace Up Ankle Foot Stabilizer Sprained Ankle appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The AT 388 LACE ANKLE SUPPORT has been designed and manufactured by AT Surgical specifically to treat and provide rapid relief to weak ankles and sprained ankles.
The Lace ankle support is a perfect fit for use while playing basketball, running, soccer, volleyball, football, or any other sport. It is also ideal for post-sports-related injuries.
This ankle support product has plenty of lace to fit all sizes. This is the most stable and adjustable one, offering the best coverage, also makes it the most comfortable, whether wearing it with shoes or not.
It locks your foot into position so you can walk without fear of further injury.

Features:

  • FIGURE 8 STRAP DESIGN: LACE ANKLE SUPPORT not only lace up nice and tight but the figure 8 strap design really stabilizes from rolling.
  • DISTINCTIVE DESIGN: Designed as a canvas construction by the professionals of AT Surgical.
  • DURABLE: To ensure it is durable, yet comfortable, providing stronger full around the ankle support and stability.
  • FULLY ADJUSTABLE: There is plenty of lace in order to fit all sizes.
  • STRONG LACES: The laces are strong enough to support ultimate compression.
  • BILATERAL FIT: Our dynamic ankle supports are bilateral, meaning they can fit both your left and right foot.
  • Superior Quality: The product is MADE IN AMERICA, consulting professionals by AT Surgical, which means it ensures and abides by the supreme quality fit for patients’ rapid pain relief.

  • Specification:

  • Item Type: Ankle Brace
  • Style: LACE Ankle Brace
  • Gender: Men/Women

  • Size

  • Size Available
  • S = 8 – 9”
  • M= 9 – 10”
  • L= 10 – 11”
  • XL= 11 – 12”

The post Lace Ankle Support Brace: Stable & Adjustable Lace Up Ankle Foot Stabilizer Sprained Ankle appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Athletic Injury Compression Wrap
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Provides moderate support and compression to muscles without constricting breathing or muscle growth, while neoprene fabric keeps muscles warm and pliable to reduce strain and hasten recovery. Indicated for strains, cramps, pulls, and sciatica. Great for use at work or on the athletic field.

The post Athletic Injury Compression Wrap appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
This Athletic Supporter is designed to protect, lift, support and hold the testes against the body. This prevents strain on the cords and muscles during activity, helping to eliminate discomfort, and keeps them away from injury, providing unobtrusive yet consistent support for a long day of work or for vigorous sports. For correct sizing, measure the abdomen between the hips and waist. 3 inch elastic waistband retains elasticity while minimizing curling at the top and bottom. Soft knit cotton/rayon pouch gives total support. Non-roll, tubular elastic leg straps help prevent binding, wrinkling or rolling, Mesh pouch

Features:

  • 3 inch elastic waistband
  • Soft knit cotton -rayon mesh pouch
  • Non-roll, tubular elastic straps
  • Excellent supporter
  • Wash in mild suds and rinse several times in clear water to clean
  • Roll in towel to absorb moisture and dry flat
  • Do not iron
  • Do not use dryer
  • Latex free

Specifications:

  • Item Type: Athletic Jock Supporter
  • Material: Soft knit cotton -rayon mesh pouch
  • Function: Protect, lift, support and hold the testes against the body
  • Color: White
  • Washable: Wash in mild suds and rinse several times in clear water to clean
  • Iron: Do not iron
  • Weigh: 3.75 oz
  • Dimensions: 4 x 1.25 x 9 in

    • Size

  • Size Available
  • Small, Medium, Large, XL

    • The post Athletic Injury Compression Wrap appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Lace Up Canvas Ankle Brace
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The Lace-Up Double Air Ankle Brace helps stabilize the joint and prevent further injury, providing excellent support for sprained, strained or weakened ankles.

Features:

  • Optional double air bladder for maximum support
  • Durable, yet comfortable canvas construction
  • Easy lace up for proper adjustment
  • Superior quality fabric construction means it will last

The post Lace Up Canvas Ankle Brace appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Size Waist
Small 8″ – 9″
Medium 9″ – 10″
Large 10″ – 11″
XL 11″ – 12″

The post Lace Up Canvas Ankle Brace appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Ankle Support
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Lessen muscle fatigue and achieve better performance results by helping to increase circulation to the lower extremities. Wear it all day, wear it during sports activities, or when you travel. Comfortable soothing compression directly aids better blood circulation and therefore the amount of oxygen that can travel to your muscles while you work out.

The post Ankle Support appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The seamless design maximizes comfort and removes pressure points on the heel and back of the ankle. Soft elastic nylon/spandex material provides support and relief from the arch of the foot to the leg.

  • 20 – 30 mmHg – Firm Compression
  • Made with an open toe and reinforced heel.
  • Smooth, opaque fabric.
  • Available in White and Beige.
  • Sold individually.

The post Ankle Support appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Shin and Achilles Protector Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The Achilles & Shin Gel Padding Sock is built to give you the most comfortable skiing and skating experience possible. The fabric is elastic, soft, and thin, taking less space inside the the boot and providing a highly breathable environment. Silicone padding around the tibia prevents discomfort that is commonly caused by ski and skate boots.

The post Shin and Achilles Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• One per order
  • Toeless sock with 2mm gel polymer soft cushion pads molded to at both sides the tibia and Achilles, protecting them from abrasion, friction, and pinching when practicing sports
  • Specially indicated for ski and skate boots
  • Used under the socks with the pad either in contact to the skin or facing the sock
  • Washable and reusable
  • Two sizes

Size

U.S. Shoe Size

Euro Shoe Size

UK Shoe Size

Calf Circumference (Largest part of the calf)
S 4 – 8.5 34-37 2-4.5 11″-14.5″ (18-26.5 cm)
L 8.5 – 13 42-45 8-10.5 14.5″-18″ (37-45.5 cm)

item.title: Achilles Protector Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• Soft, cushioning therapeutic 3mm thick gel pad moisturizes and softens dry or hard skin
  • Cushions and protects the Achilles tendon by absorbing pressure and friction
  • Indicated to alleviate pain related Achilles tendonitis and bursitis, among other Achilles injuries
  • Washable and reusable
  • Sold individually

item.title: Anklet Wrap | Figure Eight
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
This figure eight style Anklet Wrap helps prevent injury and provides excellent support for sprained, strained or weakened ankles. Features: Double strength compression wrap for…

The post Anklet Wrap | Figure Eight appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
This figure eight style Anklet Wrap helps prevent injury and provides excellent support for sprained, strained or weakened ankles.

Features:

  • Double strength compression wrap for maximum support.
  • Durable, yet comfortable under shoes.
  • Helps reduce swelling from strain, sprain, or other ankle injury.
  • Easy figure eight wrap-up bandage dressing is simple to apply yourself.
  • Superior quality fabric construction.

The post Anklet Wrap | Figure Eight appeared first on AT Surgical.
